mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

SELECT m.* FROM member_role mr LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON mr.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE mr.member_id = #{id} ORDER BY m.order_num ASC
SELECT m.* FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{id} ORDER BY m.order_num ASC
